This is the last release of Goblin XNA 3.x series which is based on XNA Game Studio 3.1. The next releases will be based on XNA Game Studio 4.0.

Hi i'm a student and I never used goblin Xna... the code for programming with the version 3.6 in visual studio will it be the same that for the goblin 4.0?

Yes, mostly. There will be many changes internally, but the API for Goblin XNA doesn't change (except for a few functions).

However, there are many API changes from XNA 3.1 to 4.0, so if you use XNA functions, it may require you change a lot.
